SELECT dc.id, dc.`name`, dc.env_id envId, dc.domains, dc.status FROM devops_certification dc JOIN devops_env AS de ON env_id = de.id WHERE de.project_id = #{projectId}
AND
dc.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
dc.env_id = #{envId}
AND
de.code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{envCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
de.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{envName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
dc.domains LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%"', #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'"%')
AND (dc.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR de.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR de.code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR dc.domains LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%"', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'"%'))
SELECT * FROM devops_certification WHERE `status` = 'active' AND env_id = #{envId} AND domains LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%"', #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'"%')
